option.name: originalContent
option.value:
version: '3'
services: mysql: image: mysql:latest container_name: contmysql ports: - "3306:3306" environment: MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD: "yes" MYSQL_DATABASE: "integrador3" volumes: - mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql restart: always
mongodb: image: mongo:latest container_name: contmongo ports: - "27017:27017" environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: password MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE: db_monopatines volumes: - mongo_data:/data/db restart: always
postgresdb: image: postgres:latest container_name: contpostgres ports: - "5432:5432" environment: POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password POSTGRES_DB: db_monopatines restart: always volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql
volumes: mysql_data: mongo_data: postgres_data:

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: '3'
services: mysql: image: mysql:latest container_name: contmysql ports: - "3306:3306" environment: MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD: "yes" MYSQL_DATABASE: "integrador3" volumes: - mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql restart: always
mongodb: image: mongo:latest container_name: contmongo ports: - "27017:27017" environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: password MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE: db_monopatines volumes: - mongo_data:/data/db restart: always
postgresdb: image: postgres:latest container_name: contpostgres ports: - "5432:5432" environment: POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password POSTGRES_DB: db_monopatines restart: always volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql
volumes: mysql_data: mongo_data: postgres_data:
